caption:
This photograph features an abstract composition with two main elements against a predominantly black background. On the left side of the frame is an object that resembles a blurred, moving fish, displaying a brilliant spectrum of colors including reds, blues, and yellows. This object appears dynamic, as if captured in motion, with a trailing effect that emphasizes its swift movement.

On the right side, a cluster of objects resembling pale, translucent balloons or orbs are grouped together. These orbs are soft in focus, giving them a ghostly, ethereal appearance. They vary slightly in size and are overlapped in a way that suggests depth, adding a three-dimensional quality to the image.

The contrasting elements — the vivid, colorful "fish" and the muted, serene "balloons" — create a striking visual dichotomy. The dark background enhances the subjects, making the colors and forms stand out more prominently, and contributes to the overall mysterious and abstract nature of the image.
title: August brings the "d'aug days" to fountain square.  "d'aug days" is a month long festival of arts presented to, for, and sometimes by, the people.  Sculpture made of gauze-covered wire hoops, suspended from balloons, sails over buildings surrounding the square and is soon lost to sight
